name: Spheroneers
description:
You are a team of engineers who have to protect a sphere which contains an alien creature, the last of its kind. You are the SPHERONEERS! Destroy stuff (with B) and repair stuff (with A) to progress.

You need 2-4 gamepads to play.

Music is "Other Worlds" by louisebyrnemusic.com

Made for the GGJ 2020 in the Designhaus Halle.
